ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Axe?
ygData.msgSnippet: How does the Dwarven Axe compare with a Mino Axe or a Combine Sword? _Dyce
ygData.messageBody:
How does the Dwarven Axe compare with a Mino Axe or a Combine Sword?

_Dyce

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Gary Long [SMTP:glong@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 3:58 PM
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Dwarven Axe?
>
> From: Gary Long <glong@...>
>
> So the picture of the Dwarven Axe I have is as follows:
>
> DMG: 6
> WT : 4
> DEL: 26
>
> Going price: 7-10pp
> nonmagical
> 1-handed slash
>
> ...which makes it a good weapon for lvl 5-9 paladins going the 1handed
> slash &
> bash route.
>
> The most competitive upgrade or alternative is the Minotaur axe (my
> current
> weapon):
>
> DMG: 8
> WT: 12
> DEL: 37
>
> Going price: 5-8pp
> nonmagical
> 1-handed slash
>
> Again, it's been a good weapon to me, but at 9th level I'd like to have a
> magical weapon which does equal or better dmg and equivalent delay. So
> far, the
> only upgrade I have heard from the group has been a combine longsword for
> 50pp.
> I've also been watching a related thread on brass magical shields going
> for 20pp
> (magical bash). I have 18pp in the bank.
>
> Is there a magical 1H slashing weapon that lies between the mino axe and
> the
> combine longsword?
>
> Kaladin, Dwarven Paladin
> --
